alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 1:18AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL WAKULLA AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 215 AM EST... At 117 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers and a few thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Crawfordville to 6 miles south of Carrabelle. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Carrabelle, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Carrabelle Beach, Shadeville, Wakulla Springs, Panacea, Medart, Buckhorn, Bethel, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Bald Point, Hyde Park, and Panacea-Wakulla Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla
